name: modify data 3d
desc: Alter the data within its inner radius to a set value and the blend data in its outer radius between its original value and the set modification value.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Transition Option
properties.desc: The Transition Option control allows the user to select how the values are modified. Linear causes the weighting to be a straight line (linear interpolation) from the Inner Weighting value to zero at the outer change radius. Non-Linear is a smooth transition (no discontinuities in slope) from the Inner Weighting value to zero at the outer change radius.

properties.name: Anisotropy
properties.desc: The Anisotropy is the ratio of the change radius in the x-y plane to the vertical (z) direction (for undistorted..not z-scaled coordinates).

properties.name: Pre Altered Z Scale
properties.desc: Pre-Altered Z Scaling is the z-exaggeration you are using for display purposes.

properties.name: Create Output Field
properties.desc: Create Modified Output Field button causes the modified data to be output.

properties.name: X Center
properties.desc: The X Center slider controls the center of the change sphere.

properties.name: Y Center
properties.desc: The Y Center slider controls the center of the change sphere.

properties.name: Z Center
properties.desc: The Z Center slider controls the center of the change sphere.

properties.name: Glyph Display Radius
properties.desc: Glyph Display Radius is the size (in your units) of the spherical glyph that identifies the center modification location.

properties.name: Modification Value
properties.desc: The Modification Value is the value to change (clamp) the data set.

properties.name: Inner Weighting
properties.desc: The Inner Weighting is the constant value over the inner change radius.

properties.name: Inner Change Radius
properties.desc: The Inner Change Radius is the radius in the x-y plane of the region affected at the constant Inner Weighting.

properties.name: Outer Change Radius
properties.desc: The Outer Change Radius is the radius in the x-y plane of the total region affected.

properties.name: Display Points
properties.desc: The Display Points toggle controls whether the affected nodes (cloud of points) will be displayed.

properties.name: Display Component
properties.desc: The Display Component is the data component that is used for coloring the cloud of points: modified_data will show the data as modified; original_data will show the data as it is unmodified; distance is the from the center; and change is the amount of change to the data.
